name: lineament

a typical feature or quality: This film appears to have the lineaments of a classic.
More examplesFewer examplesIn this story, the pursuit of happiness takes on the lineaments of a mythological quest.My life began to acquire the lineaments of a normalcy I had never felt before.Blond, blue-eyed, 6ft-plus, he definitely has the lineaments of a film star.This new production reveals the play's tragic lineaments.
